definition: to have sth made to order
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: If the client still fails to fulfill its obligation beyond the time limit, the contractor may dissolve the contract.
sentences.chinese: 定作人逾期不履行的，承攬人可以解除合同。

sentences.english: I need to get a custom-made Tuxedo for my wedding.
sentences.chinese: 我要爲婚禮去定作一件燕尾服。

sentences.english: The client may dissolve the contract if no consent has been obtained from the client in this regard.
sentences.chinese: 未經定作人同意的，定作人也可以解除合同。

sentences.english: The client may dissolve the contract if no consent has been obtained from the client in this regard.
sentences.chinese: 未經定作人同意的，定作人也可以解除合同。

definition: to make a match/to get married
Classic of Rites (same as 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4])
variant of 魯莽|鲁莽[lu3 mang3]
to determine/to fix upon/to set (a target, a price etc)
ancient meaning/original or etymological meaning of a word
Shen Yue (441-513), writer and historian during Liang of Southern dynasties 南朝梁, compiler of History of Song of the Southern dynasties 宋書|宋书
